thread.title: This “Harry Potter”-themed bubble bath set is a self-care fantasy
thread.title_full: This “Harry Potter”-themed bubble bath set is a self-care fantasy

author: Caitlin Flynn
title: This “Harry Potter”-themed bubble bath set is a self-care fantasy
text:
This “Harry Potter”-themed bubble bath set is a self-care fantasy Whenever we’re in search of a completely unique gift for a friend (or ourselves), we head to Etsy because there’s pretty much nothing you can’t find from one of the site’s sellers. For example, a Harry Potter themed bubble bath set (the ultimate self-care fantasy) is now available on the Etsy Shop TeaSoapBooks .
That’s right — the next time you’ve had a seriously rough day, you can grab your dog-eared copy of your favorite book in the series, and relax in bubble bath inspired by one of the drinks or potions mentioned in the Harry Potter series . Are you clamoring to buy one (or five) of these? (That’s a rhetorical question — of course you are.) Check out these magical options, then enjoy the bubble bath of your dreams.
Butterbeer TeaSoapBooks / www.etsy.com This bubble bath is a “sweet blended fragrance of rum, vanilla, nutmeg, and butter.” Buy it here for $10.
Polyjuice Potion Etsy / www.etsy.com Polyjuice Potion is “a beautiful, earthy blend of cucumber, oak moss, and a light base of green tea.” Buy it here for $10.
Elixir Of Life Etsy / www.etsy.com “A soothing white tea blended with light florals” sounds like the most relaxing bubble bath scent ever. Buy it here for $10.
Amortentia Etsy / www.etsy.com If you’re searching for a love potion, look no further — Amortentia bubble bath is a “beautiful fresh rose scent with crisp Lemon notes, Muguet and Geranium Leaves; followed by back notes of Blue Spruce and Musk; all enhanced by hints of cooling Mint.” Buy it here for $10.
Pumpkin Juice Etsy / www.etsy.com If you love all things sweet, Pumpkin Juice bubble bath was made for you — it’s a “sweet and spicy blended fragrance of pumpkin, cinnamon, ginger, and whipped cream.”
These amazing bubble baths were created by Drea, a Wisconsin-based Etsy seller.
“I always knew I wanted to create something involving books, and TeaSoapBooks allows me to do that. Our expanding product line currently includes soap, bath salts, and bubble bath,” she writes on Etsy . “Every item in the store is inspired by the classic combination of a good book and a hot cup of tea. Even our soap boxes look like books!…Reading has made a significant impact on my life, and I’m happy to be a part of the book community in this unique way.” Support a book-loving Etsy seller and enjoy the most relaxing Harry Potter-themed bath ever? Sign us up. We may or may not be filling our Etsy carts with these bubble baths as we speak.
